entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Burlington
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:03 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING ENDED, Burlington
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:04 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -12.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Burlington Lift Bridge 06:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
Temperature: -12.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.7 kPa rising
Humidity: 80 %
Wind Chill: -22
Dewpoint: -14.7°C
Wind: SW 30 km/h gust 43 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 70 increasing to 50 gusting to 70 this morning. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 25 this morning and minus 16 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 6. POP 70%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 70 percent chance of flurries and risk of snow squalls. Local blowing snow. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 4. POP 70%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 70 percent chance of flurries changing to 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 15. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
